scripts.test-node: (yarn stop-node-server || true) && yarn build-node-server && yarn run-node-server && sleep 10 && yarn build-apache-bench && yarn run-apache-bench && yarn stop-node-server
scripts.test-node-static: export REQUESTS=15000 export CONCURRENCY=500 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/static; yarn test-node
scripts.test-node-simulated-io: export REQUESTS=15000 export CONCURRENCY=500 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/simulated-io; yarn test-node
scripts.test-php: (yarn stop-php-server || true) && yarn build-php-server && yarn run-php-server && sleep 10 && yarn build-apache-bench && yarn run-apache-bench && yarn stop-php-server
scripts.test-php-static: export REQUESTS=15000 export CONCURRENCY=500 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/static.php; yarn test-php
scripts.test-php-simulated-io: export REQUESTS=15000 export CONCURRENCY=500 export URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/simulated-io.php; yarn test-php
